div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3: Welcome to El Reno Public Schools!
EL RENO PUBLIC SCHOOLS , 4 days ago
div.p: Thank you to all the staff working to get meals to our students!

div.h3: EL RENO PUBLIC SCHOOLS , 7 days ago
div.p: OKC Bombing. A day we will never forget.

div.h3: El Reno Public Schools , 10 days ago
div.p: As we enter typical tornado season, be aware that we WILL open the shelters listed below in the event El Reno is placed in a Tornado Watch. Since students are not on site, the "after school hours" part is irrelevant. We will post each time we open the shelters.

div.h3: EL RENO PUBLIC SCHOOLS , 19 days ago
div.p: There will be no classes or meal services Friday, April 10th per the ERPS calendar.

div.h3: EL RENO PUBLIC SCHOOLS , about 1 month ago
div.p: Online books are available for students at https://elrenolibrary.okpls.org. Login with your student ID/lunch number as both your ‘card number’ & ‘password’. Call (405) 262-2409 with any questions or find more info at https://elrenolibrary.okpls.org/one-card/
